knit_hooks$set(output = function(x, options) {
    if (!is.null(n <- options$out.lines)) {
        x = knitr:::split_lines(x)
        if (length(x) > n) {
            # truncate the output
            x = c(head(x, n), '....\n')
        }
        x = paste(x, collapse = '\n')  # paste first n lines together
    }
    hook_output(x, options)
})
